content.detailedDescription: At approx. 4 pm i went outside to walk my dogs.  it was bright and sunny.  i looked up above me into the blue, cloudless sky, and directly above me were three (3) lights circling one another - as if playing - very quickly.  they then moved one by one in a direct line to the north - each one behind the other at roughly the same distance from one another and at the same speed.  the distance above me was quite high and without any spacial reference it would be impossible to judge an accurate distance - except of course to say it was great.  none-the-less, there were no wings to indicate an airplain or bird, and no helicopter can travel that quickly and accurately around another object.  if you've ever watched flies swarm around one another you'll have a vague idea of the type of flight pattern they had.  this is my first ever sighting - if it can be classified as that.
content.summary: 3 lights in the sky circling and then moving north, in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
december 15th, 2007
no major sightings. no mysterious fog. some minor ufo movement high in the sky above the lake at approx. 3am.(on the 16th) 
however...
my daughter heard strange clicking noises outside which seemed to come from the trees on both sides of the road, so she got me and i went out and heard clicking noises as well. my daughter decided to snap some photos.
we looked at the photos taken around the house next door which captured more orbs and one "being" peering out the window of the empty house. after taking several more photos to rule out a reflection or coincidental whatever. 
my husband yelled from the living room that the tv. picture was growing small and large. 

wondering how to copyright before i go sending out photos.  i have an alien photo, and my daughter wants it copyright before sending it or do you have advice on that.  also once this is sent, how do i make sure i get the photo to the right report?
content.summary: Dark figure, orbs & electrical disturbance

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at the moon because it was especially bright. then i noticed a white star like object moving very fast it disappeared for a moment then reappeared just to disapear again....... then another object of the same description followed its path and also disappeared. i have been doing some research on 2012 and planet x and the alignment of earth and the black hole in the center of our galaxy, i don't think it is a coincidence that more people are seeing ufo's as 2012 approaches. there is absolutely no doubt in my mind, this was a ufo. the government is afraid of panic and rioting which is why they have held so much from us for so long.
content.summary: 2 star like ufo's following eachother

content.detailedDescription:
Witness awoke early, went out on patio deck to smoke a cigarette.  when looking at his feet he noticed a slight illumination of his feet.  he looked up to see a very brilliant light, almost florescent.  the object was apparently quite high and directly overhead at the initial sighting. 

the object was moving quite rapidly from west to east. the object appeared to be one large sphere tethered by a cable a second, but smaller sphere.  the apparent relative sizes of the spheres were described as the difference between a softball and a golf ball.  the spheres and the cable were aligned in the direction of travel.  both spheres were described as emitting very brilliant light as opposed to reflected sunlight.

the event took about 6 to 8 seconds, with the object moving very rapidly to the eastern horizon (towards the east side of lake tahoe).

due to the brightness, the witness could not determine any structure other than the spherical shape.  there was no sound or contrail left by the object.  the witness estimates that the apparent size of the object was such that it would be covered by half of his thumb nail held out at an arm's distance.

the witness states that his girlfriend saw the same object at the same time at her residence fifteen miles away.  (her statement to be filled in - her observation will apparently corroborate much of his description).

the witness called local tv stations in reno but was told that no one else had reported this object.

the witness expresses familiarity with the numerous commercial and military aircraft that fly over the lake tahoe area.  the unknown object moved much more rapidly that jet aircraft.
content.summary: Very bright object looking like tethered spheres

content.detailedDescription:
I made a mistake on the time of this report when i submitted it.

i was talking to my husband on msn and telling him about the noises in the house and he insisted that i go up to my moms to stay until he could get home the next day. i promised i would. my son came running in. it was about 8pm. he was very upset and told me that he saw a small midget-like thing run across the road in front of him. it was black and ran on 2 legs and had two arms. it ran down the trail to the lake. he was very afraid when he saw it and yelled. he said it was 3' tall. we went to my moms. 

shortly after my brother came up and i took him for a drive to the lake with the headlights out. we could see the light dimming and getting bright across the lake. (described in another report) we sat for maybe 5 minutes when he looked above the truck and saw a saucer shape (black), no lights. we jumped out i saw one and it zipped away so fast. then it returned and then zipped away as soon as you could see it. 

at some point after midnite the dogs needed to go outside and one of them took off up to the water tower. my son took several pictures outside and especially in the fog there are orb-like things could be seen everywhere. the fog would climb around the house and disappear very fast and then return. very odd. there were also many "meteorites". 

i am attaching 3 photos taken within seconds of each other.  the ones i am talking about on this night were somehow deleted.  these were taken a few nights later.  same thing.  these see through orbs were all through out our house too, but you only allow 3 picture uploads.  the 3 photos i am attaching are just depicting the kind of thing that went on all through december.  there were also solid orbs which i have photos of.  we did everything to try to check our camera.  this occurred on several camera's.  the orbs would come and go very quickly. these orbs appeared to turn our neighbours automatic porch light on and off.
content.summary: Dark figure & black objects above

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i was in my back yard in the afternoon of that friday jun/29/2007 after one long day of work.I was with my old brother disscusing many things about our job, my brother was seated on his truck, and i was standed on the ground front of him, when suddenly he turned his eyes to the sky and pointed something upthere.
in the first sight we thought that these object was a piece of paper, because it was white-brilliant and fly like moved by a wave.But surprise, it was moving high in the sky, and say this because in that moment was passing one airplane(my house is aproximately at 2.5 miles from douglas international airport, in charlotte)and the object was more high than the airplane, and was moving in a horizontal direction,from southwest to southeast.
it take about 2 minutes to cross the portion of sky that can see from my backyard, passing over the airport, and we were watching it with a tasco that we keep in the truck.But that does not dissapered in the horizon line.Suddenly, in a point of the sky, it simply dissapeared.
maybe 30 seconds after, and while my brother and me were talking about the strange object,three militar crafts taken fligth from the national guard base of the airport, and take the direcction toward the object dissapeared seconds before.After 30 more seconds two more fightcrafts taken fligt from the airport, and they kept in the air of the neighborhood at least 5 minutes and then they went we don't know where.
one more thing, the object had the shape like a mat, but from our position , we figure it alike dimensions of a big comercial plane, and the sky was clear and clouds free.
that is all that we saw, and we don't have any video because didn't have a camcorder or camera. sorry, by the next time.
content.summary: at my back yard, when suddenly an unknown object appear high in the sky....

content.detailedDescription: The city is under construction they are going to be adding a huge bass pro shop so maybe its sparking some curiosity and more ufos are showing up it could be a possibility
content.summary: My reasons why sightings are on the rise here in altoona iowa

content.detailedDescription: Hey guys it's wes again i know you can't believe all of the sightings i have been posting but i have a theory why there have been so many sightings in my area lately. first though about this object- i was observing the stars out my back patio window then this blood red object appeared from the western sky and was headed east slowly now i am not good at telling how high up it was or low all i say is this object was flying low not high and the two big looking red bulbs took turns pulsating back and forth and there was a hint of a white light flashing on the bottom about every ten seconds and this looked bigger then the planes that were flying around this object and there are a lot of planes out tonight i wonder if any of the pilots were close enough in range to see it i sure hope i am not the only one seeing these things there has to be others among the town that are not willing to discuss what they are seeing are afraid to be judged by others by discussing what they saw or people don't know where to report sightings at total time object was in sight was about five minutes
content.summary: It looked like two big red light bulbs stuck together

content.detailedDescription:
December 13th, 2007.
in the evening at about dinner time, my daughter called and asked me to drive her down to the restaurant. the night sky was clear as a bell and very starry. i drove over to pick her up .  both her and her b/f were standing outside pointing up in the sky (south).  i watched as two crafts were zipping around following each other. blue and red lights. we watched them as we drove to the restaurant.  after the b/f came out of the restaurant we continued to watch three crafts flying by the moon. i saw a man outside doing something near a shed and i told the b/f to yell at him and tell him to look. the man couldn't hear us so i drove over to him and pointed. he came over and i told him to look at the space ships and he looked and said, "oh ya, we see them all the time around here."  he also said that he has seen more things than he wanted to at times.  i said "omg, thank you, then it's not just us."

after we got home i looked above our house and noticed these strange stars above. they were in the shape of an octagon. they were there for about ten minutes and then one at a time they disappeared. the fog started in but only where you would walk.
content.summary: Several objects zipping around in the sky chasing each other

content.detailedDescription:
I made a first sighting report and before i finished all the 2nd set of questions the page disappeared.  please let me know of you recieved it.

this takes place after a week of strange occurrances in our home following our first encounter with a craft on the highway.

it was very clear out. you could see all the stars. my daughter and i go for a drive. it is dark now. we go down to the lake we see this fog start up just between us and the road above us. it starts to get eery and then suddenly an orange light shoots out of the sky into the cloud. we go home to get my husband. when we get there he is standing outside with the dogs looking at the sky. after he put the dogs in the house, i pick him up and take him down to the lake. we start observing all the strange "stars" and "planets" and the sudden appearance and disappearance of the fogs. my husband kind of dismisses things so we go home.  later, as my husband is again sleeping on the couch, my son and daughter and i were keeping our eyes open. at about 2 am, my husband was asleep on the couch and my daughter and son call me to the window asking me what the light was above our neighbours roof over the lake. i said, "let's go see." 
so we walked down toward the lake and it is as clear as a bell out. suddenly a fog appears, starting out small and growing and growing until it is like a path from where we came. then it totally circles us. we couldn't see the light on the lake anymore. i started to get really scared so we go home and get the truck. after we get back down there and sit for about 2 minutes still in the truck i see it! it appears octagon in shape and it is coming down the lake from n.W direction. it is flying low and had red and green/blue lights all around it. i said, "oh my god, there it is, there it is!" the kids jump out of the truck and i am freaking for them not to. then i got out too and it flew over our heads and there is a rumble like a jet very loud. my son starts flicking his lighter at it wanting it to see us! i tell him "don't!!" it continues on in a straight path  along the lake and finally the blinking lights couldn't be seen. all we see is what appears to be a star.  we are so excited! mistified! scared! we get back in the truck because it is cold. the strange fog appears rapidly over the lake. we ask each other if it was a jet or what? even though it had no wings.  suddently there is a huge blue flash that lights up the sky and it comes from the direction that we saw the "jet" go. it streaks across the sky lit up and the same shape at lightning speed and it stops right in front of us across the lake and sits there, now just looking like a star or planet. "meteorites" are everywhere.  when it lit up you could see the blue and red lights at the back of it as it streaked across the sky.  it was so fast it left a trail of itself behind it.
i panic and drive off and the kids are complaining loudly that i am taking them away from this event that is once in a lifetime. i tell them i want their dad and i go to get him!  i wake him up and he mumbles and goes back to sleep. the kids are waiting in the truck, keeping an eye on the light that lumed there. i feel like a heel, but i am terrified at the thought of taking them back there to the unknown, but i do anyway. first i stop at my brothers, wake him up and take him with us back down to the lakeside. we park the same way facing the lake but as far back from it as possible. as we sit there, we start to see them. there are at least four maybe more. there are two hovering on the lake and one comes out from the trees on the otherside and goes straight up and hovers there. it moves up and down up and down over a little then up and down. there are more over on the other side glowing through the trees. the fog appears again. then the one on the left of us which is hovering on the lake and is a long strip of lights with what looked like a search light in the center starts to get too close. my kids are in the back of the truck and i fear for them so i start to drive off. my brother wants me to stop and look for a minute more. i do this and then leave. i dropped my brother off and we went into his place to discuss what we saw. then i go home and my husband is up. my kids continue to watch out the window and see the one on the lake which we now know was the one that lured us down there to begin with. it is glowing and from that distance you can only see the search light thing. i asked my husband to go and see with me, because i really wanted him to experience what we did. finally after about half an hour he asks if i want to go. we did. as we were heading down to the lake he saw a very large black shape (the size of our town) over the lake and then it faded out. after that he only got to see the one on the lake by the mine and the strange fog that took over the whole area immediately after we got there. we could hear what he thought was the barge starting up, which would be it heading over to the other side of the lake for the first run. after that we saw no more activity. we drove up to my moms because he thought we could get a better view from her driveway. we sat there for a few minutes when i saw in the sky above the lake what looked like red and green lights flashing. it flew from the burns lake side of the lake toward smithers but not following the lake like i saw the other lower craft. this one was much higher and sounded jetlike. suddenly the fog got huge and glowing white. it came up so fast and then it began coming toward us. we went home and in the two minutes that took, the fog totally covered our town. my kids were at the kitchen window and had just seen a light hovering above the neighbour house behind us.  they described it as a solid white orb.

i am attaching a picture of the view of lake from our porch.  it is the view we saw the light that lured us to the lake.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange fog, huge craft, hyperspeed craft

content.detailedDescription: My friend, ashley k., and i got into my car at 10:15 pm on february 6, 2008. i remarked about how much brighter the stars were at her house (she lives in a newer developement area so there aren't a lot of city lights). i opened my moon roof so we could look up at the sky, and that's when we noticed one particular "star" that seemed slightly larger and had an orange hue as opposed to the other bluish stars. ashley said, "that star just moved!" and i looked at the "star" and watched it for a moment. it sort of curved around in a dipping motion. "did you see that?!" she asked me. "is it just our eyes playing tricks on us?" we loked around at the stars near it and tried to focus on them. they didn't move. meanwhile, the object displayed a total range of motion and speed. it would make complete circles, zigzags, move up, down, left, right. at one point, the object would zoom from left to right and back again, almost like it was breaking, turning around, and hitting the gas. then we noticed that there were teeny mini versions of the object that were also flying around. we watched them get really close together and then they'd back a good deal away from each other. we could see tiny red blinking lights on the objects. i believe there were 3 objects total. we watched this for about 45 minutes before i had to go (i was terribly late getting home already). we are totally amazed and convinced. it wasn't a satellite, a star, or mars...Ufo? we hope so!!! :)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was the size of a star but had an orange glow to it, which would alternate between dim and bright. at first we though it was mars but then we noticed a tiny red light blinking on the object.

content.detailedDescription:
This is very difficult, as there have been so many different sightings since november 29th, 2007.  i am going to try to file them separately even though my story won't make as much sense.  i will do this in chronicological order.

i was driving home from town on hwy 118.  i had two people with me.  it was a perfectly clear night between 6:30 pm and 7pm.  suddenly there was a fog that came up around us in which we all started talking about because it was so odd.  then, a very bright bluish light lit up around, which really startled us.  at that very moment a bright white light shot from the sky at low altitude and could have hit the ground in front of us, but not so that we could see.  we were very startled, and nervously chatted along the drive.  we drove aways and there were very bright lights that appeared in front of us.  they appeared to stretch across about half the width of the highway.  they were orange/red with an orange ora all around them.  it looked as though i might run right into them and i began to come to a stop.  it then looked as though they zipped sideways and disappeared.  this road has thick trees on either side of us.  there was no pull off and no road for anything to turn down.  when i thought i had passed the spot where this occurred i wanted to turn around and look for the lights but my passengers were too frightened so we continued home.  this happened at precisely 7:00 pm.  i know that because i looked at the clock joking about being abducted. 

okay, now i am really wondering here.  i am trying to find a video or picture to attach in order to show you what the highway looks like that we were traveling on.  i came across a video taken last october.  my daughter had just gotten a new video camera for her birthday.  i was trying to get a picture off of the video and while trying to find the best shot without showing my cracked windshield i noticed something running across the road in front of us.  it is traveling so fast. way too fast and upright for a moose.  could you examine this?  anyway i will attempt to send this.  it is depicting the area that we travel home and although going the opposite way of our sighting it is showing you what it is like.

i can't seem to upload a video.  could you let me know what to do?  i am sending  a picture of the highway and it has that creature on it.
content.summary: Blue flash and bright lights blocking road

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were spending two days at our ranch in hico on hwy 6 to go hunting with our son (38) and grandson (9).  we awoke early, having coffee on the porch at 4 am.  it was a very clear morning.  in the northeast sky, over cleburn or maybe ft.Worth, we noticed a brilliant star larger than the north star.  we had never seen a star of this magnitude in that part of the sky before.  suddenly it dropped straight down (about a quarter inch in our eyesight).  we thought we were witnessing a plane falling until it went straight back up to it's original location.  pausing for a second it went down at an angle to the right.  it was very high in the universe so it's movements had to be travelling thousands of miles per hour.  it traversed in every direction well over an hour, never leaving it's location in the sky. a couple of times, for only a second, it became solid red. it remained bright at all times.  we called our son and grandson to come quickly from their home a few hundred yards away and we all witnessed it's movements for well over an hour until the sun rose and it became invisible.  i tried to capture it with my digital night lens, but it didn't develop.  this was not a star or a plane or anything men could design that would travel at such speed.  we told our friends about the incident, but didn't report it until the happenings in stephenville, which is close by.  i'd like to say we were astounded and all the other emotions involved in spotting a ufo, but this is the second sighting for us, and far less dramatic.The other was about 40 yrs ago when we witnessed a gigantic ufo hovering closly over trees while we were driving on hwy 635 at 1 am in dallas.  it traveled at tremendous speed as it sped away. we reported it to the news, our congressman and friends, but after considerable ridicule and disbelief by everyone, we decided this time we wouldn't report this incident.  my husband and i are highly respected successful business owners in dallas.  we feel privileged to have witnessed ufos twice in our lifetime and know that whoever is sharing our hemosphere are far more advanced than we humans and are no doubt more considerate of our space than we would be of theirs given the same capabilities.
content.summary: High in the sky, looked like a star, bright white light, at times red

content.detailedDescription: The sky at sunset was a really pretty color, as you can see in the photo. i got my camera and from my backyard, facing south, i took some photos. it wasn't until i had downloaded them to my computer that i saw the 2 objects the camera had caught. i didn't even know they were there when i took the photo, so there's only this one, but it was pretty amazing.
content.summary: After downloading sunset/cloud photos to computer, disc shaped and cylinder shape objects caught in photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out at the morning sky to the sw, toward witchita falls when, seemingly out of nowhere, an extremely large, bright,glowing light appeared in the sky. the light was so bright and consuming that it was hard to tell exactly what shape it was, but if pressed i would have to say cylindrical. it flew right over me. if you hold your hand out at arm's length and look at the size of your thumb, that's how big it looked, and how high. it didn't make a sound. it continued on toward the ne and disappeared. the most amazing thing i've ever seen.
content.summary: A large golden glowing cylinder shaped object approached from the sw and flew ne silently over my head.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were standing outside the university of st. thomas' dorms smoking a cigarette when we looked up and thought we saw a satellite.  it was much too low though to be a satellite and was moving too quickly.  it made no noise whatsoever and appeared to be drifting across the sky seemingly without any form of thrust or means of propulsion.

we brushed it off as something we simply couldn't make out against the night sky, but with the reports about another ufo being sighted in texas on the same night i'm not so sure about what we saw.

i have just read the wikipedia news article about the response of the air force and would like to point out that it is very unlikely that the object we saw was an f-16.  i've seen fighter jets fly overhead before and have never seen anything move like this unless floating in space.  the lights could possibly have matched up, but the silence and the movement were uncharacteristic of a fighter plane. 

i've always hoped to see something cool like this, but was always skeptical of reports until i actually saw it for myself.  this is largely why i have not told anyone until i read the article.
content.summary: Cylindrical with 3 or 4 lights on it, otherwise black.

content.detailedDescription:
I had to take my dog out to do his thing. i noticed this extra bright star like object with pulsating, white/blue with a notable color changes especialy, like a band about the mid section. i have no idea how far it was from where i watched it at an altitude about 30 deg high, west to east.
i noticed the star like object in the direction e by ne 'moving', mostly horozintaly and what looked like circles, over the area above the central cascade mtn's three sister's. the intensity of the light varied. i used my pourch rail to view this thing from a fixed point. it also seemed to dip and circle, but it would move far enough that it sometimes would go behind the tree limbs.  all together i watched it for about 15 minutes.
content.summary: Bright, pulsating, light 'white,blue w/ amber to red, moving around.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a neon-rimmed ufo on december 1977 when i was living in charlotte, nc. i was laying in bed one evening in my darkened room. the window curtains were parted and the night sky was clear. around 9pm my eyes caught a glimpse of a lighted object traveling at a distance above the trees of my backyard. it looked strange and i took notice of it. when the object cleared the trees i saw what appeared to be a circular disc about the size of a golf ball. the object's rim was lit with a band of white light similar to a neon light. this light was uniform and steady without any blinking or strobing. in the center of the object was a point of white light. the object glided overhead at a deliberate speed traveling due north. it made no perceivable sound. i carefully watch the object for about 10 seconds until it flew over some nearby woods.

excitedly i got dressed and ran outside, but the object wasn't visible because of the tall trees. i had to run about two blocks to a large street before i could get a clear view of the sky. looking north i spotted the object. it had traveled a good distance in the minute it had taken me to get dressed and run to the street. the object now looked like a horizontal white line. its size was slightly larger than the width of the moon and it was receding into the distance. i could see two points of white light -- one above and another below the rim light. (i had seen only the bottom point light previously.) both point lights were centrally placed, the space between them being about 1/4 of the rim's width.

i watched the object for another two minutes as it flew off into the far horizon and finally disappeared. the object always maintained a straight flight, its rim never tilting away from horizontal. as the object flew away i compared it with two aircraft that were visible in other areas of the sky. both appeared to be commercial airliners with familiar blinking and colored lights. while i could easily identify these airplanes, the unknown object looked like nothing i'd ever seen. however, despite its strange appearance, the object seemed rather banal and non-threatening. i had a vague feeling that it was built by humans and was being flown for mundane reasons. that was my impression of the craft at the time.
content.summary: Neon-rimmed disc

content.detailedDescription: During this time i noticed many objects moving in the sky they looked like stars,they only moved for a few seconds until i saw one that moved toward m51 galaxy and remained there for several days becoming duller by the day.These things moved every direction at the same speeds only for a short while 4 seconds max.Ive seen satelites many times and i dont believe these are satelites .
content.summary: Star like object

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were outside because of the nice weather we were having just talking and looking at the sky when my wife noticed a very slow moving light coming towards us from the southwest traveling northwest. as it approached us we noticed it made no noise at all. it passed directly over our heads at approximately 1000 to 1500 hundred feet. shortly after it passed over our heads the object came to a complete stop. then the light went out and then we noticed a red glow or light underneath it go out nearly simutaneously. we never seen or heard anything else from it as we stood for at least 10 minutes just kind of freaking out wondering what the hell we had just witnessed. but i invite you or anyone from mufon to come to runaway bay and take a look at the sky here at night because we are seeing a lot of very strange things in the sky and would love to share it with you to prove this place is a hotbed for unexplained lights and i believe are ufos.
content.summary: Very slow moving object flying low with no noise at all

content.detailedDescription: Laying in bed i can see out my window. the first object caught my eye. it was shimmering and kind of moving in its area. as i looked out the window i saw two other, but stationary, kinda of amber colored lights. they looked like stars. they all stayed there for about 45min maybe more.
content.summary: 3 in uniform, 1 different

content.detailedDescription:
I was up and awake because i work late at home and usually go to bed at 2:00a.M. i let out the dog at 2:00a.M after our clock had struck becasue i was reminded it was bedtime and she hadn't been out yet.  i saw a really bright light pulsating at an irregular interval through the trees to the east.  if i had been at a higher level i would have seen that it was at the top of the tree levels or just above.  we have airplanes that track over up on the way to the mn airport in bloomington and the flying cloud airport and a helicopter rental..All in an easterly direction so i didn't think too much about it except that it was irregular, really bright like the planet mars but about 15 times stronger and about 4 times bigger- clearly terrestrailly oriented, and it had no other flashing lights that an airplane would have.  i came in with the dog and went up to my apartment which is upstairs about 15 - 25 feet above ground level and looked out the eastern facing window.  i could then see it was above the trees and stationary.  i waited about 30 seconds to see if it had movemant comming toward me or away - because it would not appear to be moving then.  it wasn't and suddenly flared up about 3 times and got really bright then shunk down again to its former intensity and size.  when it flared a yellowish part of the light appeared to extend downward. 
 it was very cold and clear so i still told myself that perhaps i was seeing a helicopter just above the trees with a searchlight that was tilting around on the bottom of it an thus giving the affect. i got out my binoculars and looked at it and i could see the same thing only larger and clearer and then it pulsed again even brighter and the that lower yellow extension of light was really visable... and then another one came up along side it to my left and thus from the south.  this was not as intense and only raised to be level with it on the same plane and then stayed still.  the first pulsed again and then i new it was unidentifiable by me.  
 i woke my wife and brought her to the window which all took about two minutes. she tried the binoculars but has to have glasses and couldn't get them in focus.  shelooked at them with her naked eyes (with her glasses on) and she was moved to say whoa- which should somewhat support the intesity and oddness of it. i continued to watch through binoculars.  i guess about 5-8 minutes had passed, but i havn't gone through this statement to add up the time i already stated.
 at this point a third came above the treeline from the south and all three started to move north/northwest.  this entire 5-8 minutes the first had stayed perfectly stationaty pulsating irregularly (strong, weak, weak, weak, strong, strong, strong, strong, weak, strong...You get it) the second had stayed still and perfectly spaced to the right(south) of the first.  as soon as the third came into view it was spaced as far as the second was to the first, all three started to move...As i have stated.
 this was about a full minute to all happen.  
  at this point my wife thought it was all over but had the same reaction of wow...And decided to return to bed.  i said goodnight 30-45 seconds, then returned to the window with the binoculars.  the first 3 were gone when a 4th came up faster than the others were moving and stopped where the first one had been.  if pulsed once.  it jumped or moved up, then down, then went very fast to the north/northwest.  this jumping up and down was not a great distance from where i was.  if i were going to plot it on my window as if this had all happened in 2 dimensions it would be less than a half inch.  but at the distance away they were - at least 5 miles it must have been great. it was a very fast up/down and then move.  that confirmed for me is was not identifiable.

  i called the flying cloud airport and the helicopter place and they stated they had no activity at that time.  they are very small.

 i know distance is hard to gage but i think it was at least 5 miles away- just above the tree line, perhaps above lake riley.  i looked on mapquest and moved the map over eastward trying to figure out where it was and that seams to be the most likely poistion.
i will watch the skies tonight to see if they or conventional aircraft do anything like this to either dispell or confirm my thought.
 i would like to believe it was conventional but they just didn't portray conventional behavior. 
 give me a call if you want more.  i just hope others saw it too.
content.summary: 4 orange/yellow irregularly pulsating lights that were stationary then moved

content.detailedDescription:
At the age of 16 in oct 1970 (i just remember it was fall) i and my friend were coming home from school.

i stopped at the stop sign just below my friend's house. as i pulled away from the stop sign another boy who lived in the neighbor hood rode his bicycle right in front of the car. i had to hit the brakes hard to keep from hitting him. i yelled at him through the open window. "whats wrong?" he looked like he was about to cry. he yelled back "flying saucer". 

my frined and i just laughed. we pulled up to my frieds house where we stood out in his front yard talking for a minute or two. we were joined by his youger sister and very young brother (they had walked down from the nearby elementry school).

i was facing my frind and his brother and siter. all of a sudden i noticed they were looking up in the air, i looked up also and saw about 40 feet above my frineds house a very large metalic looking something. this thing was montionless and made absoutely no noise. i would gues it was about 50 feet long and 20 feet wide. (it was about 1 1/2 times longer than the house). the craft had what appeared to be port holes at least along the side that i could see. it looked liked the skin was made of polished aluminum. i saw no signs of construction like rivets, seams, supports, struts or anything. other than the port holes which were round and seemed to be recessed a few inches into the craft, the outside was completly smooth , no gondolas, propellers, wings, stablizers, wires, nothing. the day was clear and we got a good look at it. i saw no way to enter the craft (at least from the side i was looking at).

we all watched in silent as the craft remained motionless for about 1 to 1 1/2 minutes. all of a sudden it shot up very fast (i guess it went up about another 40 feet) then it banked to the right and up at a maybe 20 degree angle and made a large "z" in the air. in a split second it was maybe 1,000 to 2,000 feet away. 

the craft went higher and turned left, it was now over us and heading out of town. i jumped in the car and drove as fast i as could trying to keep it in sight. i kept it in sight for maybe another 3 or 4 minutes but by now it was pretty high. it slow down some but was still going very fast maybe 400 or 500 miles an hour.

it may sound strange but we didn't talk about it for years and when we did we both agreed that we didn't know what we saw. now my frined and his little brother only seem to have a vague memory of "something" happening.I haven't talked with his sister since she lives out of town now.

the boy on the bicycle was another story. as i said i didn't talk about the event for years, i didn't want to be labeled a nut. i saw the boy on the bicyle about 10 years ago and he told me his story. he said he was riding his bike across the river bridge (it was kinda of a odd time most of the adults in west point had 9-5 jobs and school had been out a while so the roads were petty empty) anyway this craft had (according to him) come out of the water and was literally chasing him. no wonder he was so upseat. i saw him again about 3 years ago he says he still has night mares about the event. 

as a note the boy on the bike said he developed skin cancer, he is disabled and walks with a cane, my friend also developed skin cancer (melanomia).

during the event i was more amazed than scared, that came later.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Metalic looking cigar with rounded ends ufo seen maybe 40 feet above my friends house, slient had portholes along side, moved very fast in z pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on my living room sofa at 6:30 p.M. when an extremely super brilliant glowing neon red sphere shaped object caught my attention through my living room window.  i told my wife to look at it also.  i first thought it was an airplane on fire.  it was so bright, it was lighting up the sky around it.  it moved horizontaly in a straight line from the direction of lake erie, in euclid, ohio, southbound about a miles distance towards rt.90 at a slow rate about 500 feet above the houses.  it then seemed to lose a bit of altitude when it just vanished. it wasn't very large but the light it emmitted was something else. my wife and myself said to each other that it was the brightest red color that we have ever seen. total time seen was about one minute.
content.summary: Extremely bright neon red light slowly moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work about 4:30 a.M. heading north on loop 410 after i passed pearsall rd. in the far distance i noticed what at first appeared to be a helicopter in the distance hovering over a neighborhood. as i drove closer i noticed it was still and not moving. it was hovering over the houses outside loop 410 between medina base rd. and valley hi dr. right outside the military base there. it was hovering very low about 200 ft. in the air. it had very bright dark green lights on the top then it would change to deep red lights on the bottom. on that day there was a fine mist in the air and you could see how large this disc was because when the top green lights would slowly turn on the mass of this object would block the light from shining down and the same thing with the red lights it had under it the body of this object would block the light from going up. the size was about the size of a blimp but disc shaped. i slowed down to look at it and noticed that all the other drivers on the highway also slowed down to about 20 mph. it hovered for a couple of minutes then slowly moved away. i know it was not a plane or jet because it was still. i also am sure it was not a helicopter because of the size of the object, to big to be a police news or airlife helicopter. i hope some of you other drivers who also saw it come out and hopefully have other details on this object, whether it be one of our aircraft or not. i would just want to find out what it was.
content.summary: Very large object in the sky, hovering with very bright green and red lights

content.detailedDescription: People please wake up!Our skies are constantly being patrolled with craft (alien) in louisiana skies.They move at will when they want  every night on a whim!I really feel sorry for america,for something serious is about to transpire soon!Our skies are being invaded!Cross my heart hope to die!
content.summary: Chemtrail spraying ll day today did not stop major activity from becoming obvious in our skies!

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down hyw 51 south not far from springtown tx.Twards weatherford the land has rolling hills,i looked to the east there was a massive object in the sky prob. a footballfield covered with lights.I am a retired navy combat veteran and have been around aircraft all my life,actually my dad is a retired eastern pilot who has also seen ufos.Anyway moving at a very slow speed aproaching the highway.Almost exactly like stevenville,there was no noise.A object that large needs lift,by our propultion standards,there were no engines.Moving at prob 10 mph.I tried to get my wife to pull the car over but she was terrified.It crossed the road behind us.I tried to call you folks after seeing your add in ft worth paper and nobody called back or i just missed it. i now have no doubt in my mind that we are not alone.
content.summary: Huge very wide and long many bright lites

content.detailedDescription: Witness was outside of matt blatt car dealers in vineland when they looked up and saw aprox 50 crescent shaped objects in the sky.  they were the size of an asprin held at arms length.  the objects came in waves ,.Shaped like a boomerang. they did manuver into different formations. they were in the south east sky.  they were very high and a shiny silver or white surface , dependind on the suns reflections. the objects then flew out of sight.  the only airport close by would be millville airport. aprox 10 miles.
content.summary: Aprox 50 crescent shaped objects in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was just walking back into my house from my garage, when i looked up and saw 3 red lights in a triangle formation fly silent over my house, the triangle got bigger, and longer then flew up  directly up. they flew in formation over the house. i can se heathrow from here and the flight path as i live on top of a hill, and no way where they planes!
content.summary: 3 lights making a triangle
